decks.notes: This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of removal spells, card advantage, and controlling the board. Utilizing a mix of removal, counterspells, and creature control, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and grind them out of resources. With a mix of instant-speed removal and powerful planeswalkers like Elspeth, Storm Slayer, the deck can adapt to various threats and maintain control of the game. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's three-color requirements while also providing flexibility and consistency in casting spells.

This deck focuses on filling up the graveyard with key creatures, then bringing them back onto the battlefield with reanimation spells. By utilizing a combination of cards like Squirming Emergence and Wail of the Forgotten, as well as Atraxa, Grand Unifier's ability to reduce the cost of reanimation spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence. Additionally, using cards like Founding the Third Path and Omniscience, the deck can further accelerate its game plan and out-value the opponent.
